name: Scare's Repairs
description:
Game developed in 48 hours for Global Game Jam with theme of repair.

Synopsis:

You are tasked to fix up an abandoned house while unearthing some of it's troublesome past.

Controls:

  • Movement:                                           WASD + Use mouse to look
  • Crouch:                                                                    Hold Down Ctrl Key
  • Make repair / interact:                                           Hold Down LMB
  • View TODO list:                                                        Hold Down RMB
